TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PathGradientBrush extends System.Drawing.Brush
Public NotInheritable Class PathGradientBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class PathGradientBrush sealed : System::Drawing::Brush

summary.span: 封装 对象，它通过渐变填充 对象的内部。

span.span: Encapsulates a object that fills the interior of a object with a gradient.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 颜色渐变是从路径中心点到路径外边缘边缘的颜色平滑着色。The color gradient is a smooth shading of colors from the center point of the path to the outside boundary edge of the path. 混合系数、位置和样式会影响渐变的开始和结束位置，并影响底纹的速度。Blend factors, positions, and style affect where the gradient starts and ends, and how fast it changes shade. 路径渐变画笔不遵循 用于执行绘制操作的对象的属性。Path gradient brushes do not obey the property of the object used to do the drawing. 使用 对象填充的区域以 (化名) 的方式呈现，而不考虑平滑模式。Areas filled using a object are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the smoothing mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 。The following code example shows how to create a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 e，它是的参数 。This example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires the e, which is a parameter of . [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.UsingaGradientBrush#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingaGradientBrush/CS/Class1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.UsingaGradientBrush#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingaGradientBrush/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，它指定定义渐变自定义过渡的位置和因素。

span.span: A that represents a custom falloff for the gradient.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含混合系数和位置的相应数组。A contains corresponding arrays of blend factors and positions. 混合系数指定要在相应位置处使用的起始颜色和结束颜色的百分比。The blend factors specify the percentages of the starting color and ending color to use at the corresponding position. 位置的指定百分比为沿渐变路径的距离。The positions are given as a percentage of distance along the gradient path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含颜色和位置的相应数组。A contains corresponding arrays of colors and positions. 位置是0到1之间的值，用于指定沿相对颜色所在的渐变路径的距离的百分比。The positions are values from 0 through 1 that specify the percentage of the distance along the gradient path where the corresponding color is located.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径并向其添加一个矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 从路径点创建 (在此示例中，点构成一个矩形，但它可以是大多数形状) 。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 将中间颜色设置为红色，将周围颜色设置为蓝色。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 在 应用乘变换之前，将绘制到屏幕。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the multiply transform. - 创建将画笔90旋转的矩阵，并在两个轴将其转换为100。Creates s matrix that rotates the brush 90 degrees and translates it by 100 in both axes. - 使用方法将此矩阵应用于画笔 。Applies this matrix to the brush by using the method. - 在屏幕上绘制画笔。Draws the brush to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径并向其添加一个矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 从路径点创建 (在此示例中，点构成一个矩形，但它可以是大多数形状) 。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 将中间颜色设置为红色，将周围颜色设置为蓝色。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 在 应用旋转变换之前，将绘制到屏幕。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the rotate transform. - 使用画笔方法将旋转转换应用于画笔 。Applies the rotate transform to the brush by using its method. - ) 屏幕上绘制旋转的画笔 (矩形。Draws the rotated brush (rectangle) to the screen. 请注意，底部矩形旋转了45度，与平移前绘制的矩形相比。Notice that the bottom rectangle is rotated 45 degrees as compared to the one drawn prior to the translation. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 代码The code - 创建图形路径并向其添加一个矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 从路径点创建 (在此示例中，点构成一个矩形，但它可以是大多数形状) 。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 将中间颜色设置为红色，将周围颜色设置为蓝色。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 在 应用缩放变换之前，将绘制到屏幕。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the scale transform. - 使用缩放转换将其方法应用于画笔 。Applies the scale transform to the brush by using its method. - 调用 方法以移动画笔矩形，使其不会覆盖之前绘制到屏幕的画笔。Calls the method to move the brush rectangle such that it does not overlay the one drawn to the screen earlier. - 将已转换的画笔矩形绘制到屏幕上。Draws the translated brush rectangle to the screen. 请注意，底部矩形的长度为 x 轴中的两倍，就是在转换前绘制的矩形。Notice that the bottom rectangle is twice as long in the x-axis as is the one drawn prior to the translation. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 创建一个从中心色向周围色线性过渡的渐变过程。

span.span: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to one surrounding color.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetBlendTriangularShape(float32 focus) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: focus
param.span: 介于 0 和 1 之间的一个值，它指定沿路径中心到路径边界的任意半径向上中心色亮度最高的位置。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 1（默认值）使最高亮度位于路径中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

summary.span: 创建一个从中心色向周围色线性过渡的渐变过程。

span.span: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to one surrounding color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数组中有多个颜色，则 使用数组中的第一种颜色作为结束颜色。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此数组中指定的颜色用于画笔边界路径上的离散点。The colors specified in this array are used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. ## Examples 有关示例，请参阅 `.`For an example, see `.`

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetBlendTriangularShape (float focus, float scale);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetBlendTriangularShape(float32 focus, float32 scale) cil managed
Public Sub SetBlendTriangularShape (focus As Single, scale As Single)
public: void SetBlendTriangularShape(float focus, float scale);

param.name: focus
param.span: 介于 0 和 1 之间的一个值，它指定沿路径中心到路径边界的任意半径向上中心色亮度最高的位置。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 1（默认值）使最高亮度位于路径中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

param.name: scale
param.span: 介于 0 和 1 之间的一个值，它指定与边界色混合的中心色的最高亮度。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the maximum intensity of the center color that gets blended with the boundary color.

param.span: 1 导致中心色的最高可能亮度，并且它是默认值。

span.span: A value of 1 causes the highest possible intensity of the center color, and it is the default value.

summary.span: 创建一个从中心色向各周围色线性过渡的渐变过程。

span.span: Creates a gradient with a center color and a linear falloff to each surrounding color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数组中有多个颜色，则 使用数组中的第一种颜色作为结束颜色。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此数组中指定的颜色是画笔边界路径上的离散点所使用的颜色。The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. 默认情况下，当你从路径渐变的边界移到中心点时，颜色将从边界逐渐变为中心色。By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color. 通过调用此方法，可以自定义边界和中心色的定位和混合。You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径并向其添加一个矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 从路径点创建 (在此示例中，点构成一个矩形，但它可以是大多数形状) 。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 将中间颜色设置为红色，将周围颜色设置为蓝色。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 在 应用 blend 变换之前，将绘制到屏幕。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the blend transform. - 通过使用 blend 转换方法，将其应用于画笔 。Applies the blend transform to the brush by using its method. - 调用 方法以移动画笔矩形，使其不会覆盖之前绘制到屏幕的画笔。Calls the method to move the brush rectangle such that it does not overlay the one drawn to the screen earlier. - 绘制转换后的画笔矩形。Draws the transformed-brush rectangle is drawn to the screen. 请注意， (红色) 的最大中心颜色从路径中心到路径边界的半路位置。Notice that the maximum center color (red) is located half way from the center of the path to the path boundary. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicPathGradientBrush/VB/form1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 基于一个钟形曲线创建中心色和第一种周围色之间的渐变过渡。

span.span: Creates a gradient falloff between the center color and the first surrounding color based on a bell-shaped curve.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetSigmaBellShape(float32 focus) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: focus
param.span: 介于 0 和 1 之间的一个值，它指定沿路径中心到路径边界的任意半径向上中心色亮度最高的位置。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 1（默认值）使最高亮度位于路径中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

summary.span: 创建一个从路径中心开始向路径边界更改颜色的渐变画笔。

span.span: Creates a gradient brush that changes color starting from the center of the path outward to the path's boundary.

summary.span: 从一种颜色向另一种颜色的转换基于一个钟形曲线。

span.span: The transition from one color to another is based on a bell-shaped curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数组中有多个颜色，则 使用数组中的第一种颜色作为结束颜色。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此数组中指定的颜色是画笔边界路径上的离散点所使用的颜色。The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. 默认情况下，当你从路径渐变的边界移到中心点时，颜色将从边界逐渐变为中心色。By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color. 通过调用此方法，可以自定义边界和中心色的定位和混合。You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies where, along any radial from the center of the path to the path's boundary, the center color will be at its highest intensity.

param.span: 1（默认值）使最高亮度位于路径中心。

span.span: A value of 1 (the default) places the highest intensity at the center of the path.

param.span: 介于 0 和 1 之间的一个值，它指定与边界色混合的中心色的最高亮度。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies the maximum intensity of the center color that gets blended with the boundary color.

param.span: 1 导致中心色的最高可能亮度，并且它是默认值。

span.span: A value of 1 causes the highest possible intensity of the center color, and it is the default value.

span.span: The transition from one color to another is based on a bell-shaped curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数组中有多个颜色，则 使用数组中的第一种颜色作为结束颜色。If there is more than one color in the array, the first color in the array is used for the ending color. 此数组中指定的颜色是画笔边界路径上的离散点所使用的颜色。The colors specified in this array are colors used for discrete points on the brush's boundary path. 默认情况下，当你从路径渐变的边界移到中心点时，颜色将从边界逐渐变为中心色。By default, as you move from the boundary of a path gradient to the center point, the color changes gradually from the boundary color to the center color. 通过调用此方法，可以自定义边界和中心色的定位和混合。You can customize the positioning and blending of the boundary and center colors by calling this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径并向其添加一个矩形。Creates a graphics path and adds a rectangle to it. - 从路径点创建 (在此示例中，点构成一个矩形，但它可以是大多数形状) 。Creates a from the path points (in this example, the points form a rectangle, but it could be most any shape). - 将中间颜色设置为红色，将周围颜色设置为蓝色。Sets the center color to red and the surrounding color to blue. - 在 应用 blend 变换之前，将绘制到屏幕。Draws the to the screen prior to applying the blend transform. - 通过使用 blend 转换方法，将其应用于画笔 。Applies the blend transform to the brush by using its method. - 调用 方法以移动画笔矩形，使其不会覆盖之前绘制到屏幕的画笔。Calls the method to move the brush rectangle such that it does not overlay the one drawn to the screen earlier. - 将变换画笔矩形绘制到屏幕上。Draws the transformed-brush rectangle to the screen. 请注意， (红色) 的最大中心颜色从路径中心到路径边界的半路位置。Notice that the maximum center color (red) is located half way from the center of the path to the path boundary. summary.span: 获取或设置与此 填充的路径中的点相对应的颜色的数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of colors that correspond to the points in the path this fills.

value.span: 一个 结构的数组，表示与此 填充的路径中的各点相关联的颜色。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the colors associated with each point in the path this fills.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的每个 对应于路径中的一个点。Each in the array corresponds to a point in the path.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个用于定义此 的局部几何变换的 的副本。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the that defines a local geometric transform for this .

value.span: 定义几何变换的 的副本，该变换仅适用于通过此 绘制的填充。

span.span: A copy of the that defines a geometric transform that applies only to fills drawn with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 几何转换可用于平移、缩放、旋转或倾斜渐变填充。A geometric transform can be used to translate, scale, rotate, or skew the gradient fill. 由于由属性返回的矩阵 是画笔几何转换的副本，因此，当您不再需要矩阵时，您应该释放它。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the brush's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

summary.span: 将指定的转换应用于局部几何变换。

span.span: Applies the specified translation to the local geometric transform.

summary.span: 该方法将预先计算对转换的平移。

span.span: This method prepends the translation to the transform.
